title: About the changes to the jungle item costs (Riot please just read this, it's really quick)
body:
Despite the rage I'm seeing about it, I get why you're doing it. However, before you make it a live change…

PLEASE COMPENSATE THE JUNGLE CHAMPS THAT NEED IT. As it stands, when you put this patch out, many junglers that aren't #biglcsplays will have to clear another camp (and possibly recall first) in order to afford this. The problem with that is the champs that are affected are the same ones you guys are saying you want to be viable again. This makes that VERY hard.

So yeah, compensate champs during the same patch, or before. Otherwise you're just showing the world how very little you care about non-LCS champions…. again.
